ygData.subject: Re: Advice for a new Necromancer
ygData.msgSnippet: 6-8 and 10-12 are the ones that ive had some trouble with, but have made it. ... From: Murphy, Kenneth E.  To:
ygData.messageBody:
6-8 and 10-12 are the ones that ive had some trouble with, but have made it.

-----Original Message-----
From: Murphy, Kenneth E. <MurphyK@...>
To: 'EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com' <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, April 29, 1999 12:59 PM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Advice for a new Necromancer


>From: "Murphy, Kenneth E." <MurphyK@...>
>
>Hello.
>
>I recently started a new dark elf necromancer on Mythannial Marr. I'm a
>whole lev 2 at this point. I haven't trained any skills yet at the guild
>hall. Can I get some advice as to what spells to focus on? Is 2H staffs the
>weapon I should be using?
>
>Also at what level will I start to get a good feel for being a necromancer
>and start coming into my own? Are there any levels I should just gut out?
>For example my lev 15 magician had a very rough time at lev7 but at lev8
>things were MUCH easier. When I get lev 16 with my magician tomorrow or the
>next day I'll again see a HUGE increase in power. I'm assuming Necromancers
>work the same way?
>
>Any tips would be appreciated.
>
>Eloric Lev2 Necro - Mythannial Marr -
>
>... Thanks Kenneth
>
>Kenneth E. Murphy, OCP
>Research Associate - Oracle Database Administrator
>OSEDA (Office of Social & Economic Data Analysis)
>University Outreach & Extension
>University of Missouri - Columbia
>Ph: (573) 884- 8794 Fax: (573) 884-4635
>murphyk@...
